faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know
faq.answer1: We support Minecraft (Java & Bedrock), Discord bots, VPS applications, and many other popular multiplayer servers. More games are added regularly.
faq.answer2: Yes, all our services include advanced enterprise-grade DDoS protection to keep your servers secure and online 24/7.
faq.question3: Can I upgrade my plan later?
faq.answer3: Yes. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from the billing panel without losing data.
faq.answer4: Refunds are provided according to our refund policy. If you face any issues, contact our support team for help.
faq.answer5: Server setup is instant. Your service is deployed automatically within seconds after payment.

footer.description: AstroNodes provides reliable, high-performance game and VPS hosting with enterprise-grade security.
